welcome_message_body: Welcome to Spartanburg, where southern charm meets modern innovation. Explore our vibrant downtown, rich history, and beautiful landscapes, and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Sugar-n-Spice Drive-In Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sugar-n-Spice Drive-In Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Spartanburg.

restaurants.name: Monsoon Noodle House
restaurants.description: Monsoon Noodle House is a noodle restaurant located in Spartanburg.

restaurants.description: Boots’ & Sonny’s Drive In is a hot dog joint located in Spartanburg.

restaurants.name: Venus Pie Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Venus Pie Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Spartanburg.

restaurants.name: Converse Deli
restaurants.description: Converse Deli is a deli located in Spartanburg.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Donaldson Center Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights at Donaldson Center Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
